poem:
A New Boom

A $5,000 cry  
enters the world—  
coaxed to grow  
in uncertain soil.  
Promises unfold  
like paper cranes,  
fluttering hopes  
in a cluttered sky.  
Will they take root?  
Can dollars nurture  
a rosy future  
in this frail garden  
we call life?
